basic.name: Spirit Swoop
basic.description: Deal 141 damage to enemies in a line. {highlight}Spirit stays at the end of the line for 4 seconds, providing vision. Reactivate to move Spirit. If targeting an enemy Hero, Spirit divebombs them, dealing 120 damage and slowing by 50% (decays over 3 seconds), then returns to Rexxar.{/highlight}

basic.name: Misha, Charge!
basic.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 150 damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

basic.name: Mend Pet
basic.description: Heal Misha for 714 Health over 5 seconds.

basic.name: Jungle Instincts
basic.description: {highlight}Switch between Misha's automatic and manual modes. In automatic mode, Misha, Focus! changes to Offensive and Defensive behaviors. In Offensive Mode, Misha targets any enemy hero within leash range. In Defensive Mode, Misha focuses on enemies close to Rexxar.{/highlight}

heroic.name: Stampede
heroic.description: {highlight}Channel to call down hordes of rampaging thunder lizards that explode around Rexxar's enemies for 3 seconds. Each explosion deals 120 damage.{/highlight}

heroic.name: Unleash the Boars
heroic.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing damage, revealing, and slowing enemies.

trait.name: Misha, Focus!
trait.description:
Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait.
Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar.
Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

1.name: Meat Mending
1.description: {highlight}Empowers Misha's next basic attack, increasing its damage by 100% and reducing its target's armor by 20 when Mend Pet is used.{/highlight}

1.name: Animal Husbandry
1.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 maximum Health every second, {highlight}up to 500, increasing the cap by 100 every level. You receive a bonus of 25 maximum health on takedowns and 10 on globes.{/highlight} This bonus is lost on Rexxar's death.

1.name: Thrill of the Hunt
1.description: {highlight}Rexxar's basic attacks increase Misha's movement speed by 25%, and if Misha gets close to Rexxar after stunning a target with Misha, Charge!, Rexxar gains 20% movement speed for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

4.name: Hungry Animals
4.description: {highlight}Misha's basic attacks instantly kill enemy troops and heal Misha for 2.25% health. This bonus is doubled against heroes. When Spirit divebombs an enemy hero, it heals Rexxar for 12.5% of his maximum health.{/highlight}

4.name: Bird of Prey
4.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions. {highlight}Spirit can now divebomb mercenaries and monsters, dealing 400% damage.{/highlight}

4.name: Misha, Protect!
4.description: {highlight}When Misha stays close to Rexxar, both receive 25 armor and reduced crowd control effect durations by 35%.{/highlight}

4.name: Huffer
4.description: {highlight}Summons Huffer to damage enemy heroes from distance for 12 seconds. On the last 5 seconds alive Huffer will have increased 40% attack speed and 25% movement speed{/highlight}

7.name: Crippling Talons
7.description: {highlight}Spirit divebomb's slow is now increased to 70% and doesn't decay anymore.{/highlight}

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's basic attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.

7.name: Bestial Wrath
7.description: {highlight}Misha's basic attacks against enemy heroes grant a stacking 25% increased attack damage bonus for 4 seconds.{/highlight}

10.name: Stampede
10.description: {highlight}Channel to call down hordes of rampaging thunder lizards that explode around Rexxar's enemies for 3 seconds. Each explosion deals 120 damage.{/highlight}

10.name: Unleash the Boars
10.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals 21 damage per second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. {highlight}While under Mend Pet effect, increase Wildfire Bear damage by 100%.{/highlight}

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's basic attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dire Beast
13.description: Rexxar and Misha's basic attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.

16.name: Beast Roar
16.description: {highlight}Knocks back enemies around Misha by a significant distance when Mend Pet is used.{/highlight}

16.name: Primal Intimidation
16.description: {highlight}After using Mend Pet, Misha will reduce every nearby enemy hero's spell power by 50% and attack speed by 35% for 2 seconds.{/highlight}

16.name: Feigned Death
16.description: Activate to cause Rexxar to feign death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time, Rexxar can control Misha.

20.name: STAAAAAAAAAAMPEDE
20.description: {highlight}Rexxar's Stampede will have a second wave after three seconds, starting from Rexxar's initial cast position.{/highlight}

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Leokk
20.description: {highlight}Summons Leokk to inspire nearby allied heroes for 12 seconds, increasing their attack speed by 40% in an area. Leokk will have 1200 HP.{/highlight}

20.name: Bond of Sacrifice
20.description: {highlight}If Rexxar takes a fatal hit while Misha is alive, Misha will die and heal Rexxar for Misha's remaining HP.{/highlight}
